languages.text: The wearer gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}: all allies in the target {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} their weapons after each attack made by them until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}

languages.text: 装备者获得一个额外的{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}：目标{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域内所有盟友每次攻击结束之后，都会自动立即{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}武器，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}: all allies in the target {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} their weapons after each attack made by them until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}

traits.locale_text: 装备者获得一个额外的{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}：目标{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域内所有盟友每次攻击结束之后，都会自动立即{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}武器，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。

languages.text: 使用者はさらに1つ{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}策略{/g}を得る：ターゲットの{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}戦闘領域{/g}内にいる全ての味方は、使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、攻撃を行うたびに武器が即座に{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}される

traits.locale_text: 着用者はさらに1つ{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}策略{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る：ターゲットの戦闘領域内にいる全ての味方は、着用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時まで、攻撃を行うたびに武器が即座に{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}される

languages.text: El portador gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} adicional: todos los aliados de la zona de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recargan{/g} inmediatamente sus armas después de cada ataque hasta el comienzo del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}: all allies in the target {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} their weapons after each attack made by them until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}

traits.locale_text: El portador gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} adicional: todos los aliados de la {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}zona de combate{/g} objetivo {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recargan{/g} inmediatamente sus armas después de cada ataque que realicen hasta el comienzo del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

El portador gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} adicional: todos los aliados de la zona de combate {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recargan{/g} inmediatamente sus armas después de cada ataque hasta el comienzo del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält ein zusätzliches {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Stratagem{/g}: Alle Verbündeten im Bereich der {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Kampftaktiken{/g} des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}laden{/g} bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers nach jedem Angriff sofort ihre Waffen.

languages.text: Takan kişi, ilave bir {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}savaş hilesi{/g} kazanır: Hedef {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanında bulunan tüm dost birimlerin yaptıkları her saldırının hemen sonrasında silahları {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}dolar{/g}.
